sourcesContent:
// translation.js
export const translations = {
  id: {
    home: 'Beranda',
    bank: 'Bank',
    bast: 'BAST',
    kwitansi: 'Kwitansi',
    pembayaran: 'Pembayaran',
    profile: 'Profil',
    logout: 'Keluar',
    edit: 'Edit',
    delete: 'Hapus',
    save: 'Simpan',
    cancel: 'Batal',
    add: 'Tambah',
    name: 'Nama',
    email: 'Email',
    phone: 'Telepon',
    logo: 'Logo',
    description: 'Deskripsi',
    year: 'Tahun',
    actions: 'Aksi',
    appName: 'Surat CV Maliki',
    companies: 'Perusahaan',
    kategori: 'Kategori',
    login: 'Masuk',
    register: 'Daftar',
    password: 'Kata Sandi',
    noAccount: 'Belum punya akun?',
    register: 'Daftar',
    registering: 'Mendaftar...',
    allFieldsRequired: 'Semua data wajib diisi',
    invalidEmail: 'Format email tidak valid',
    passwordMin6: 'Password minimal 6 karakter',
    unauthorizedRole: 'Anda tidak diizinkan memilih role ini',
    fileTooLarge: 'Ukuran file terlalu besar (max 2MB)',
    invalidImageFormat: 'Format gambar harus JPG, PNG, atau JPEG',
    selectedFile: 'File terpilih',
    code: 'Kode',
    alreadyHaveAccount: 'Sudah punya akun?',
    registering: 'Mendaftar...',
    selectLanguage: 'Pilih Bahasa',
    welcomeToArtOf: "Selamat datang di Seni",
    digitalCorrespondence: "Korespondensi Digital",
    everyLetterCarriesMeaning: "Di mana setiap surat membawa makna, setiap dokumen menceritakan kisah, dan setiap transaksi menjadi jembatan antara niat dan realitas.",
    inEveryCorrespondence: "Dalam setiap korespondensi terletak esensi koneksi manusia, menjembatani jarak melalui kekuatan kata-kata tertulis.",
    accessYourAccount: "Akses akun Anda dan kelola dokumen",
    createNewAccount: "Buat akun baru untuk memulai",
    signIn: "Masuk",
    signUp: "Register"
  },
  en: {
    home: 'Home',
    bank: 'Bank',
    bast: 'BAST',
    kwitansi: 'Receipts',
    pembayaran: 'Payments',
    profile: 'Profile',
    logout: 'Logout',
    edit: 'Edit',
    delete: 'Delete',
    save: 'Save',
    cancel: 'Cancel',
    add: 'Add',
    name: 'Name',
    email: 'Email',
    phone: 'Phone',
    logo: 'Logo',
    description: 'Description',
    year: 'Year',
    actions: 'Actions',
    appName: 'CV Maliki Letters',
    companies: 'Companies',
    kategori: 'Category',
    login: 'Login',
    register: 'Register',
    password: 'Password',
    noAccount: "Don't have an account?",
    register: 'Register',
    registering: 'Registering...',
    allFieldsRequired: 'All fields are required',
    invalidEmail: 'Invalid email format',
    passwordMin6: 'Password must be at least 6 characters',
    unauthorizedRole: 'You are not authorized to select this role',
    fileTooLarge: 'File is too large (max 2MB)',
    invalidImageFormat: 'Image format must be JPG, PNG, or JPEG',
    selectedFile: 'Selected file',
    code: 'Code',
    alreadyHaveAccount: 'Already have an account?',
    registering: 'Registering...',
    selectLanguage: 'Select Language',
    welcomeToArtOf: "Welcome to Art Of",
    digitalCorrespondence: "Digital Correspondence",
    everyLetterCarriesMeaning: "Where every letter carries meaning, every document tells a story, and every transaction becomes a bridge between intention and reality.",
    inEveryCorrespondence: "In every correspondence lies the essence of human connection, bridging distances through the power of the written word.",
    accessYourAccount: "Access your account and manage documents",
    createNewAccount: "Create a new account to get started",
    signIn: "Sign In",
    signUp: "Sign Up"
  }
};
